Get a specific user by ID (admin only)
Redirect to Google OAuth login page
Handle Google OAuth callback and login/register user

Get new access token using refresh token
Create a new user account with email and password

get.description: Check if the API is running
Get the currently authenticated user's data

Change the currently authenticated user's password

Get paginated list of user's scans

parameters.description: Whether to store the image (default: false)
parameters.name: store_image

get.description: Get a specific scan by its ID
